data.eml:eml: Ilnacorahenryi, a new species of plant bug from Mexico (Heteroptera, Miridae, Orthotylinae, Orthotylini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schwartz, Michael D. (2018): Ilnacorahenryi, a new species of plant bug from Mexico (Heteroptera, Miridae, Orthotylinae, Orthotylini). ZooKeys 796: 241-252, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.796.21285, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.796.21285
